page.title: 07Industry in and near Baldock
page.content:
The small amount of industrial activity in this block is to be found in or near Baldock.
The only obvious connection with farming is two former oasthouses, one of which is deserted and the other is a drugs warehouse.
There are two light engineering works tucked into the residential area of N. Baldock and one along the A505 just outside Baldock.
In N. Baldock there are also two builders, a printer, a furniture restorer and a food packaging factory which mainly does short runs for large firms such as General Foods.
